casebody.data:
Hugh Howell HESTER, Jr. and Jennifer F. Plouffe, as natural Guardians of and on behalf of C.H., a minor, Appellants,
v.
ALL CHILDREN'S HEALTH SYSTEM INC., a Florida Corporation; All Children's Hospital, Inc., a Florida Corporation; Palm Harbor Internal Medicine and Pediatrics, P.A., a Florida Professional Association; and Karena Aileen Neri, M.D., Appellees. Case No. 2D17-2294 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District. Opinion filed August 24, 2018

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed.
